mpicxx -fPIC  -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG  -shared -Wl,-soname,libofamgx.so -o libofamgx.so CMakeFiles/ofamgx.dir/AmgXSolver.cpp.o  -L/srinivas/OFAmgX/lib -Wl,-rpath,/srinivas/OFAmgX/lib:/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -lamgxsh -lmpi
